thumb.title: ZERO DIVIDE ORIGINAL GAME SOUNDTRACK
thumb.description: PS1用3D格闘ゲーム ZERO DIVIDEのサントラです。作業用BGMにどうぞ。#00:00 01 - TOUCH AND GO#01:18 02 - TIME ROUTE#02:38 03 - BURNING BLOOD#03:50 04 - A NATION OF POISON#07:46 05 - THE POWER BEAT#10:58 06 - CONFUSION#14:16 07 - HYPERSONIC#18:42 08 - KURAGE#23:41 09 - NIPPON#28:09 10 - FIREBUG#30:40 11 - WAITING FOR THE SOUND OF THUNDER#34:21 12 - THE ART OF DISTRUCTION#38:36 13 - FATE#42:00 14 - LOSER#42:15 15 - A VOYAGE#45:45 16 - REGISTRATION#46:36 17 - ASSAULT#48:30 18 - EXTREME#49:21 19 - MOON SIDE#52:27 20 - BIO CAVE#53:57 21 - NIPPON(PS EXPO'95 MIX)#59:00 22 - A NATION OF SILENCE
